testcase.name: Authentication > POST /register > should return 400 status code if the body is missing
Authentication > POST /register > should return 400 status code if the body is invalid
Authentication > POST /register > should return 400 status code if password does not meet minimum requirements
Authentication > POST /register > should return 400 status code if email format is invalid
Authentication > POST /register > should return 201 status code if the user is registered
Authentication > POST /register > should return 400 status code if the user is already registered
Authentication > POST /login > should return 401 status code if the user is not found
Authentication > POST /login > should return 401 status code if password is incorrect
Authentication > POST /login > should return 400 status code if the body is missing
Authentication > POST /login > should return 400 status code if the body is invalid
Authentication > POST /login > should return 201 status code if the user is found
Authentication > GET /refresh > should return 403 status code if cookie is missing
Authentication > GET /refresh > should return 403 status code if cookie is invalid
Authentication > GET /refresh > should return 200 status code if cookie is valid
Authentication > GET /refresh > should return 403 status code if refresh token was already used
